A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They went with the \"We're running out of gas\" bit. I've got a real hard time accepting they spent a ridiculous hour and half \"staying out of range\" because they were running out of fuel. What\, you're telling me the Order couldn't catch up? Plus\, where the hell was the ghost of Hayden Christensen?! It was not what I would have made\, but\, at the very least\, I thought it was better then Force Awakens and Phantom Menace. So\, there's that.
